Address.label: Address
Address.value: 12755 EAST NINE MILE ROAD, WARREN, Michigan, 48089, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Universal Logistics Holdings Inc is an asset-light provider of customized transportation and logistics solutions throughout the United States, and in Mexico, Canada and Colombia. It offers services such as truckload, brokerage, intermodal, dedicated, and value-added services. The company reports into four segments namely trucking, intermodal, company-managed brokerage, and contract logistics. The majority of the revenue is earned from the contract logistics segment.
